959070.name: Fantasy Grounds - Creature Codex Lairs (5E)
959070.description:
Creature Codex Lairs

Note: This book requires the Tome of Beasts and Creature Codex add-ons for the encounters to work.
Take the Fight to Foul Creatures in Forests, Fields & Dungeons!
Creature Codex Lairs for 5th Edition brings you 9 great monster lairs for the world's first roleplaying game! Each of these exciting and unusual battlegrounds comes with a complete short adventure, including a hook, terrain map, area hazards, tactics, and treasures. Stage your 5th Edition fights in unforgettable one-shot adventures including:
  • Lair of the Fire Cult, Level 1
  • A Rat Among Us, Part 1, Level 3
  • A Rat Among Us, Part 2, Level 3
  • Caverns of the Howling Moon, Level 4
  • Paying the Shadow Toll, Level 4
  • Swept Away, Level 6
  • Ice Maiden's Kiss, Level 7
  • King of Ill Fortune, Level 8
  • Trollkin Hunt, Level 10
Designed by RPG veteran Shawn Merwin, the
Creature Codex Lairs add an aura of danger and wild adventure to your game!
Creature Codex Lairs uses standard monsters as well as surprising new creatures from the
Creature Codex and the
Tome of Beasts . Both monster books are required for maximum utility.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Linda Buth, and Team Twohy LLC
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
